name: Hempart Indonesia
description: A bonafide company with specialization in delivering talent search and business consulting services to organization in various industries while organizing inventive events and supporting a meaningful contribution to society and the environment which established in Jakarta 2002 and consistently growing stronger.
features: Provide a consultancy service with international standard
Providing a skillful & dynamic technical team
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: Powering The Opportunity
ShortDescription: Focused on supplying qualified manpower services to the Oil and Gas industry in Indonesia and on a worldwide basis.

Highlights.name: Talent Search and Business Consulting Services
Highlights.description: Hempart Indonesia is a company that specializes in providing talent search and business consulting services . This means that they can help businesses find the qualified employees they need .

Highlights.name: Creative Event Strategists and CSR Specialists
Highlights.description: In addition to talent search and business consulting, Hempart Indonesia also offers creative event strategists and CSR specialists . This means that they can help businesses with a wide range of needs.

Highlights.name: Serving Major E&P Companies and PSCs
Highlights.description: Hempart Indonesia's clientele includes major E&P companies and PSCs within Indonesia . This suggests that they have a good reputation for providing high-quality services.

enhanced_description: Hempart Indonesia, established in Jakarta in 2002, is a bonafide company specializing in delivering talent search, qualified manpower services, and business consulting. They are particularly focused on supplying manpower services to the Oil and Gas industry, including major E&P companies and PSCs, both within Indonesia and on a worldwide basis. In addition to their core talent and business consulting, Hempart Indonesia also offers creative event strategists and CSR specialists, aiming to support meaningful contributions to society and the environment while boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity.
key_use_cases: Talent acquisition and staffing for various industries, especially Oil and Gas
HR consulting services, including specialized manpower supply
Providing skillful and dynamic technical teams
competitive_advantages: Specialization in talent search and business consulting
Established focus on the Oil and Gas industry in Indonesia and worldwide
Proven track record serving major E&P companies and PSCs
Ability to provide skillful and dynamic technical teams
Offers creative event strategy and CSR specialist services
roi_benefits: Access to qualified and dynamic technical teams
